Services.heading: Expert Cleaning Solutions
Services.subheading: Advanced techniques and professional expertise for exceptional results across commercial spaces.

carpet.title: Carpet Cleaning
carpet.description: Your carpets deserve a truly deep clean. Mwood Cleaning is a trusted partner for maintaining both the cleanliness and longevity of your carpets. Our expert team uses advanced techniques and eco-friendly products to ensure a deep, revitalizing clean that is safe for your home. We remove allergens and tough stains, leaving your carpets fresh, inviting, and looking brand new. Experience the transformation as we bring new life to your living spaces.
bullets: Advanced techniques & eco-friendly products
Remove allergens and tough stains
Fresh, inviting, brand-new look
Bring new life to your living spaces

sofa.title: Sofa Cleaning
sofa.tagline: A Deeper Clean for Your Favorite Seat
sofa.description:
You love your comfortable couch, but have you thought about what's hiding inside? Sofas can trap residue parasites, dust, and microscopic organisms, becoming a breeding ground for germs.

That's why Mwood offers a deep cleaning service that's safe for your home. We take your concerns seriously, using only non-harmful, ISO Certified chemicals. Our trained cleaners will remove all spots, making your sofa clean just like new and extending its life. Contact us for the best service in Dubai, and make those binge-watching TV nights even more enjoyable.
bullets: ISO Certified, non-harmful chemicals
Removes spots and stubborn residues
Safe for family and fabrics
Restores like-new comfort

curtain.title: Curtain Cleaning
curtain.description:
Your curtains do more than just block the sun; they protect your home by trapping dust, mites, and smoke. This buildup can trigger respiratory issues like asthma.

Mwood's professional service makes your home healthier. We use the best non-harmful, ISO Certified detergents to leave your curtains completely clean and spotless, all while retaining their original colour. Contact us to make your home look and feel brand new.
bullets: Removes trapped dust, mites, and smoke
ISO Certified detergents
Spotless while retaining original colour
Healthier air at home

About.heading: About MWood Cleaning Services
About.intro: MWood Cleaning Services is a professional team dedicated to delivering top‑quality cleaning for commercial spaces across Dubai. We combine trained staff, pro‑grade equipment and safe, ISO‑certified chemicals to achieve consistently excellent results.
About.speciality: Our speciality is – Cleaning, Shampooing & Steaming
About.mission: Create clean, healthy environments by delivering exceptional service with a focus on quality, reliability and customer satisfaction every visit.

Equipment.heading: Professional Equipment & Chemicals
Equipment.description: We don't just clean, we restore. We use industry-leading Karcher machines and safe, ISO-certified chemicals to ensure a deep clean without harming your valuable carpets, sofas, or your family's health.

features.feature1: State-of-the-art Karcher Puzzi 10/2 Adv extraction technology
features.feature2: Advanced Karcher BDS 43/180 C disc cleaning systems

puzzi.title: Karcher Puzzi 10/2 Adv
puzzi.summary: Professional spray extraction machine delivering deep, residue‑free cleaning for carpets and upholstery.
puzzi.subheadline: Professional‑grade deep‑cleaning technology used in every Mwood service.
description: We use the Karcher Puzzi 10/2 Adv, a professional spray-extraction system engineered for deep, residue-free cleaning of carpets and upholstery. Its 2 bar spray pressure drives cleaning solution deep into textile fibres while an integrated defoamer prevents soap buildup, leaving surfaces genuinely clean and soft.
This is the same technology trusted by top-tier facilities for precise, hygienic results.
puzzi.benefitsTitle: What this means for your space
bullets: The Puzzi 10/2 Adv delivers a residue-free finish through its integrated defoamer system, ensuring carpets stay fresh and comfortable without sticky film.
Its adaptive design allows quick, tool-free switching between broad floor areas and delicate upholstery, achieving efficient cleaning in every part of the home.
With a high-performance 1 250 W turbine and 80 W pump, the machine extracts embedded dirt and moisture from deep within fibres for a noticeably restored texture and appearance.

bds.title: Karcher BDS 43/180 C Classic
bds.summary: Versatile single‑disc machine for scrubbing, carpet care, and even sanding worn parquet flooring.
bds.subheadline: Versatile single‑disc machine for scrubbing, carpet care, and even sanding worn parquet flooring.
description: The Karcher BDS 43/180 C Classic is a professional-grade single-disc machine designed for deep scrubbing, carpet care, and even sanding worn parquet flooring. It’s the all-in-one solution for restoring and maintaining every type of hard or textile surface in your home.
bds.benefitsTitle: What this means for your space
bullets: The BDS 43/180 C Classic delivers a deeper, more reliable clean through its maintenance-free metal gear system that ensures smooth, even power.
Its true floor versatility allows technicians to switch between scrubbing, carpet care, and hardwood restoration in seconds.
And with a wide 430 mm balanced design, every pass stays efficient and safe, protecting your floors from unnecessary strain.
specs: Drive: Maintenance‑free all‑metal gear planet carrier
Use cases: Deep scrubbing, carpet care, parquet sanding

rm760.title: Karcher CarpetPro Cleaner RM 760 Powder
rm760.summary: Professional spray‑extraction powder delivering deep, fiber‑safe, residue‑free carpet cleaning.
rm760.subheadline: Fiber‑safe, residue‑free extraction formula for consistently fresh results.
description: For every carpet and textile cleaning project, Mwood uses the Karcher CarpetPro Cleaner RM 760 Powder Classic, a professional-grade formula developed specifically for high-performance spray extraction with our Puzzi machines.

This is not a conventional detergent, it’s a precision powder with a pH of 8.2 that dissolves embedded dirt and stains while remaining exceptionally gentle on textile fibers. The result is a thorough clean that preserves the softness, color, and longevity of your carpets.
rm760.benefitsTitle: What this means for your space
bullets: The CarpetPro Cleaner RM 760 Powder achieves a truly deep, residue-free clean by breaking down soil at the fiber level and extracting it completely, leaving no sticky film behind.
It is safe for valuable flooring materials, combining strong cleaning power with a formula proven gentle on delicate carpets and upholstery.
Through its perfect synergy with Karcher equipment, every application delivers consistent, high-quality results that restore freshness and comfort across your space.
specs: Compatibility: Optimized for Karcher Puzzi machines
